name: Alien Hunt (itch) (WittyWare)
description:
Story

You play as a soldier who is trained to hunt down aliens. But these aliens aren't simply going to reveal themselves in their green suit. They disguised themselves as everyday, regular objects. It's up to you to track these aliens down and annihilate them from the face of the earth, before it's too late!!

Gameplay

The game plays as a mix between Prop Hunt and Where's Waldo. It features a total of 20 levels across 2 unique locations. You use the keyboard to control the camera and try to get the right angle in order to see in each little nook and cranny of the map. Once you've spotted your target, you can use the mouse to identify them as an alien and blast them away.

Controls

  • Use W/S to zoom the camera in and out
  • Use A/D to rotate the camera left and right
  • Use E/Q to pan the camera up and down
  • Use the left mouse button to select aliens

Credits

This was a part of the Kenney 2021 Game Jam and as per the rules, all of the assets have been from various packs released by Kenney over the years. The only exception to this rule have been the music and a couple of sound effects that I simply couldn't find amongst the packs. Besides that everything has been made by me, WittyAdrian.
